<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">12094a091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb3a</macroponent><name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, imports}) {
	const rlName = event.payload.relatedListName;
	if (rlName) {
		let rlRequests = {...api.state.relatedListRefreshRequests};
		rlRequests[rlName] = { timestamp: new Date().getTime() };
		api.setState('relatedListRefreshRequests', rlRequests);
	}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 17:20:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5d190e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcbfe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Log Related List Refresh Request on Record Page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5d190e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcbfe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 17:20:45</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
